page.title: 11BRYNNAUS LOCAL GOVERMENT
page.content: {GOVERMENT, Brynna's local goverment has found people like Mr T Hughes to stand for election and who ever has the most votes wins and becomes a local councillor. The local authority services clean roads,sweeps them.As well dustmen are also a local authority service.So are fireman and they also provid policemen.The civil servents do the paper work involved in the local goverments plans.A councillor holds a surgery to let people come and say what must be done or what they don't understand.A councillor is a link between goverment and the people. {BY { Hazel Jenkins { { { }
